string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Call the crib, same number, same hood, and it's all good."
"When I die I wanna go to hell, cause I'm a piece of shit, it ain't hard to fucking tell. Crime after crime, from drugs to extortion. I know my momma wish she got a f***** abortion."
"Shit, don't ask me, I went from ashy to nasty to classy."
"Don't you know a killing is thrilling? All the blood spilling is all a part of drug dealing."
"If you don't love yourself, I'll make you see your own heart."
"I got techniques drippin' out my butt cheeks. Sleep on my stomach so I don't f*** up my sheets."
"Super Nintendo, Sega Genesis, when I was dead broke man I couldn't picture this."
"Excellence is my presence. Never tense, never hesitant."
"Girls pee pee when they see me. Navajos creep me in they tee-pees."
"I never wish death on nobody, cause there ain't coming back from that."
"We just sittin here tryna win, tryin not to sin."
"Ima tell you like a nigga told me, cash rules everything around me."
"Armed and dangerous, ain't too many can bang wit us."
"I grew up a fuckin screw up, got introduced to tha game, got an ounce and fuckin blew up."
"I was a terror since the public school era. Bathroom passes, cutting classes, squeezing asses."
"We can't change the world unless we change ourselves."
"I'm a soldier, ready for whatever."
"I'm stuck living the life of a ghetto nigga."
"I love it when ya call me Big Poppa."
"We used to fuss when the landlord dissed us. No heat, wonder why Christmas missed us. Birthdays was the worst days."
"I'm living everyday like a hustle. Another drug to juggle. Another day, another struggle."
"Everything you get. You got to work hard for it."
"This instant, rappers too persistant, quick to spit Biggie name on shit."
"The Underboss of this holocaust."
"No aspiration to quit the game."
"Fuck it I didnt wanna go to heaven anyway."
"It's on *****, fuck all that bickerin beef. I can hear sweat trickling down ya cheek."
"Don't you know a killing is thrilling? All the blood spilling is all a part of drug dealing."
"It was all a dream..."
"Relax and take notes while i take tokes of the marijuana smoke."
"Birthdays was the worst days, now we sip champagne when we thirsty."
"Run from the police picture that, niggga I'm too fat, I fuck around and catch a asthma attack, That's why I bust back, it don't phase me, When he drop, take his glock, and I'm Swayze."
"Dangerous, we good fellas, *****s can't bang with us."
"Take they cheese, take they spot, take they keys, make my faculty live happily ever after in laughter."
"I spit phrases that'll thrill you, your nobody til somebody kills you."
"I don't give a fuck about you or your week crew, what ya gonna do when big poppa come for you?"
"Damn, niggas wanna stick me for my paper."
"The more weed smoke I puff, the more dangerous."
"I never wish death on nobody. 'Cause they ain't coming back from that."
"I'm a soldier, ready for whatever."
"I'm stuck living the life of a ghetto n!gga."
"If you don't love yourself. I'll make you see your own heart."
"I'm living everyday like a hustle. Another drug to juggle. Another day, another struggle."
"We can't change the World. Unless we change ourselves."
"I'd rather go toe-to-toe with all a ya'll, runnin' ain't in my protocol."
"Biggie be Richie like Lionel."
"Just grab the fucking keys and cruise up the block.... if the bitch acts shot; gettin shot on the spot!"

"As I grab the glock, put it to your headpiece One in the chamber, the safety is off release Straight at your dome homes, I wanna see cabbage Biggie Smalls the savage, doin your brain cells much damage."
"All I want is bitches, big booty bitches. Used to sell crack so I could stack my riches."
"Don't they know my nigga gutta, fuckin' kidnap kids? Fuck 'em in the ass, throw 'em over the bridge."
"I got nines in the bedroom, glocks in the kitchen. A shotty by the shower if you wanna shoot me while I'm shittin."
"The thrill is gone, the black Frank White is here to excite and throw dick to dykes. Bitches I like em brainless. Guns I like em stainless steel. I want the fuckin Fortune like the Wheel."
"I got techniques drippin out my buttcheeks. Sleep on my stomach so I don't fuck up my sheets."
"I was a terror since the public school era. Bathroom passes, cutting classes, squeezing a--es."
"Remember Rappin' Duke, duh-ha, duh-ha. You never thought that hip hop would take it this far. Now I'm in the limelight 'cause I rhyme tight."
"Beatin' motherfuckers like Ike beat Tina."
"I see the gimmicks, the wack lyrics."
"I'm sick of niggas lying, I'm sick of bitches hawking. Matter of fact, I'm sick of talking."
"Doctors say I need about three weeks of recovery. All the nurses is lovin' me, sayin' 'The best part of the day is my half'. Feedin' me breakfast and giving me a sponge bath."
"Biggie Smalls is the wickedest Niggaz say I'm pussy? I dare you to stick your dick in this If I was pussy I'd be filled with syphillis Herpes, gonorrhea, chlamydia, gettin rid of ya."
"Run from the police picture that, nigga I'm too fat."
"I perform like Mike Anyone - Tyson, Jordan, Jackson, action."
"I can hear sweat trickling down your cheek. Your heartbeat sounds like sasquatch feet Thundering, shaking the concrete."
"Who the fuck is this? Pagin me at 5:46 in the mornin crack a dawnin Now Im yawnin, wipe the cold out my eye See whos this pagin me and why."

"As I leave my competition repirator style, climbed the ladder to success escalator style, hold ya'll breath, I told ya'll, death controls ya'll, BIG don't fold ya'll. I spit phrases that'll thrill you, your nobody till somebody kills you."
"Hoes is irritating like the hiccups, excuse me, flows just flow through me, like trees to branches , cliffs to avalanches."
"Biggie Smalls is the illest, your style is played out like, 'What you talkin bout Willis?'"
"After realizin, the master enterprisin, I ain't have to be in school by 10, I then began to encounter, with my counter... parts, on how to burn the block apart."
"Talk slick, you get your neck slit quick, 'cause real street n***** ain't havin' that shit."
"If I wasn't in the rap game. I'd probably have a key (kilo) knee-deep in the crack game. Because the the streets is a short stop. Either you're slinging crack rock or you got a wicked jump shot."
"Motherfucker please, it's my block with my rock, fuck the hip-hop, them one-two's and you don't stop."
"If Faith had twins, she'd probably have two Pacs, Get it, Tu-Pac's?"

"It was all a dream, I used to read Word Up magazine. Salt'n'Pepa and Heavy D up in the limousine. Hangin' pictures on my wall. Every Saturday Rap Attack, Mr. Magic, Marley Marl, I let my tape rock 'til my tape popped."

"Man n***** come through I'm taking high school rings too. Bitches get stripped down for they earrings and bangles. And when I rock her and drop her I'm takin her door knockers. If she's resistant then...baka! baka! baka!"
"If you didn't know, now you know."
